description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health status, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notesbackend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root endpoint '/' is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, constructing the URL based on the incoming HTTP request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic application information as a string.
